FileFormat.FormatDescription: Adobe Design software such as Photoshop, Illustrator and InDesign use color swatches to assign specific color values to a design. These can be created using many different color spaces and can even use color libraries, such as Pantone. Adobe Swatch Exchange is a format used for storing, importing and exporting color samplers and pickers.

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: Absolute from beginning of file, magic bytes: ASEF..
